attributes.action: Allow people to marry where they choose.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like couples to be able to approach an approved celebrant, via the Register Office or religion of their choice, and agree with him or her when and where their marriage would be solemnised. 

Rather than marriages being restricted by an approved venue. This would give people the freedom to hold the ceremony in the place closest to their hearts as it should be when making this commitment to each other.
